I am looking for 10 beta testers to take a test run of the openvz node located in the Immedion data center. (Asheville, NC).

Test IP: 208.83.142.198

After the 10 day beta test if all is well. I will offer a free yearly vps to each of the beta testers. 

The plan will consist of the follow:

`128 MEG/128 VSWAP
  15 GIGs of Disk Space (Raid10)
  200G of BW @ 1 Gbps
  NAT IPV4  20 Ports/ 1 SSH           
  /112 ipv6    `



If you're interested just shoot a email to trial @ aggressivenetworks com. 


Please make sure to have a answer to this question. Are you willing to give me details about the service? 


I will reply with in 24hrs upon the reception of  the emails.
